title: APOT
name: Additional Point of Termination
definition: Further identifies the physical ACTL Point of Termination.
fieldNotes: Implemented September 25, 1999  71. RORD -  Related Order Number Identifies a provider's related order number.
This field may be used to convey a CENTREX order number obtained from the provider representative handling the CENTREX account.
usageNotes: Required when the provider has pre-assigned  a  related order number, otherwise prohibited.
